content: and have access to more personal knitting assistance more free pat- terns and videos please join us on patreon wweeee mmuusshhrroooomm copyright ©© -- 22002222 bunnymuff 1 gills stalk with base colour loosely cast on 12 sts distribute sts with base colour cast on 12 sts distribute sts evenly across needles and join to work in the round be- evenly across needles and join to work in the ing careful not to twist round being careful not to twist round 1 *ktbl p1 repeat from * to end of round knit 5 rounds for a short mushroom and 10 round 2 *ktbl kfb repeat from * to end of round 18 rounds for a taller mushroom sts purl 1 round round 3 *ktbl p2 repeat from * to end of round round 4 *ktbl p1 increase 1 st i picked up and ktbl of knit 8 rounds for a short mushroom and 13 the bump of the purled st p1 repeat from * to end of rounds for a taller mushroom round 24 sts round 5 *ktbl p1 repeat from * to end of round next round *k2tog k2 repeat from * to end break yarn leaving live sts on needles to join cap colour of round 9 sts and work mushroom cap bind off all sts leaving a long tail to secure fold- ed seam and sew to gills mushroom cap round 1 with cap colour knit continue the rest of the ffiinniisshhiinngg cap using the cap colour fold the bottom of the stem the cast-on edge round 2 *k2 m1 repeat from * to end of round 36 sts to the inside at the purled round secure inside with the tail rounds 3 - 5 knit 3 rounds attach bound off edge to the centre of the gills round 6 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 30 under the cap sts rounds 7 & 8 knit 2 rounds with base colour work a number of french knots or embroider small circles on the cap round 9 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 24 sts add a hanger to the top for an ornament or set rounds 10 & 11 knit 2 rounds into your scene round 12 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 18 sts round 13 knit 1 round round 14 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 12 sts you may begin stuffing at this point if you like round 15 knit 1 round round 16 *k2tog repeat from * to end of round 6 sts break yarn pull through carefully stuff or finish stuffing the cap through the bot- tom hole i used the bottom of a pencil for help sew up the hole and pull thread up the centre to create a dent and secure work stalk wweeee mmuusshhrroooomm copyright ©© -- 22002222 bunnymuff 2
